title: Celery Seed Oil

ingredients.name: white onion (one half, cut into fine dice)

steps: In a small saucepan, add the chicken fat, onion, and celery seeds.
Heat over medium to medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, until the onions take on a light golden hue and the oil smells fragrant, around 15 minutes.
Remove from the heat, reserve in the pot and allow to cool.
Strain and transfer to a container.
If not using immediately, keep in the fridge for up to 6 months.
notes: The celery seed in this oil boosts the flavor of chicken, giving bowls a western flavor.
Particularly good in chicken paitan ramen.
250 mL is approximately 1 cup, converted to approximately 225 grams (chicken fat is less dense than water).
1.5 tbsp celery seeds equals approximately 13 grams.
Store in the fridge for up to 6 months.
